attributes.action: remove powers from cafcass that make children stay in dangerous situations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cafcass force my son to spend time in his fathers care even though he is scared of him. after an hour in his fathers company cafcass officer deemed him fit to care for my son.....what qualifications give her the right to force my son anywhere? and threaten me with contempt of court if we don't adhere to it???my sons well being is being comprimised for the sake of her end of year bonus for cases resolved on time when they're not...parents should not be threatened to keep quiet !

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
